text: Ani tumhala jhale tari kaya ki tumhi allahacya margata kharca nahi karita? Vastavika akasancya ani dharaticya samasta vastunca svami (ekata) allahaca ahe. Tumacyapaiki jya lokanni vijayapurvi allahacya margata dile ahe ani dharmayud'dha (jihada) kele ahe te dusaryancya samana nahita kimbahuna tyancyapeksa ucca padace aheta, jyanni vijaya praptinantara dana dile ani jihada kele. Hoya bhala'ica vayada tara allahaca tya sarvansi ahe ani je kahi tumhi karita ahata, allaha te janato
